snippet: The former New York governor decided to drop representation by the state attorney general’s office after sharp disagreement over the defense in the lawsuit.
abstract: Former New York Gov George E Pataki drops state attorney general as his defense counsel on eve of trial scheduled to begin in Federal District Court in Manhattan; Pataki is facing civil suit filed by six men who claim that under an initiative he supported as governor, they were wrongfully confined to state mental hospitals after completion of prison sentences for sexually violent crimes.
lead_paragraph: The former New York governor decided to drop representation by the state attorney general’s office after sharp disagreement over the defense in the lawsuit.

headline.main: Pataki Changes Lawyers to Fight Suit by Men Confined After Prison for Sex Crimes
headline.print_headline: Pataki Changes Lawyers to Fight Suit by Men Confined After Prison for Sex Crimes
